text: 5:3-4 Maika 6:8; Matyu 11:30; Jon 14:15; 14:21-24; 16:33; 1 Jon 3:9; 4:4; 2 Jon 1:6E God gifongezir arazimra kara. God bar a gifonge, kamaghɨn e an Akar Gavgavibar gɨn mangam. Godɨn boriba bar nguazir kamɨn arazir kurabar gavgavim gafira, kamaghɨn amizɨ an Akar Gavgavibar gɨn mangamin tuavim e basemezir puvatɨ. E nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn iti. Egha e uan nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn tuavimɨn nguazir kamɨn arazir kuraba dɨkabɨragha dagh afira.
